pkgmetadata.longdescription: Chordalysis R Package // Learning the structure of graphical models from datasets with thousands of variables. More information about the research papers detailing the theory behind Chordalysis is available at http://www.francois- petitjean.com/Research (KDD 2016, SDM 2015, ICDM 2014, ICDM 2013). The R package development site is https://github.com/HerrmannM/Monash-ChoR.
